name: A kinky pair of boots named (Nylon) and (Beat)
data: It increases the users strength a bit.
It increases the users dexterity a bit.
It increases the users constitution a tiny bit.
It increases the users wisdom impressively.
It increases the users intelligence like a god.
It increases the users charisma somewhat.
It has average armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
It decreases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'sneak'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'hiding'.
It gives small penalty to the skill 'attack'.
It gives small penalty to the skill 'quick chant'.
It grants resists and shit and other shit and even some jesus-like shit
and stuff. And it's hardly in tune, but who gives a shit nor a flying fuck
with a shit like this piece of SHIT!!
